title: Map of Italy - Interactive Map of Italian...
text:
FREE Newsletter. Sign Up Now! Find Italy destination information by clicking the city, island or region name on our map 
Clicking our interactive map of Italy will take you to information on the tourist destinations you see on the map. Clickable Map of Italy Â© 2006 by James Martin, licensed to About Click the region, island or city name to get destination information Other Maps of Italy 
Geographical Map of Italy - learn Italy's geography from Italy for Visitors 
Airports Map of Italy - Find Italy's 25 major airports with links to their English language web sites 
Rail Map of Italy - Find the rail routes in Italy and ticket purchasing information with our rail map. 
Map of Italy's Regions - Italy is divided into 20 regions, do you know them? Regional Maps of Italy on About 
Campania Map - The area around Naples is noted for stunning beauty, Greek and Roman archaeological remains, and great food. 
Lazio Maps - The area around Rome is more interesting than you might think for fine wine and fascinating Etruscan sites. 
Piemonte Map - The 2006 winter Olympics put Piemonte on the map, but it really shouldn't have needed to. Piemonte has great food, the best cheeses in Italy, and the bulk of Italy's finest wine. 
Puglia Maps - Three maps to help you plan your trip to Italy's "heel of the boot," Italy's next Tuscany, according to pundits. 
Tuscany Map and Essential Travel Resources - Plan a trip to everyone's favorite region. (Also see the Tuscan Distance Map to help you plan that driving or train trip to Tuscany) 
Umbria Map and Essential Travel Resources - Vacation in Italy's green heart. Specialty Maps of Italy 
Interactive Rome Map - Zoom in to see Rome's neighborhoods. 
Lake Region of Italy Map - Find out the watery goodness that's a short drive or train ride north of Milan Related Articles
